metadata.title: CVE-2024-27044 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  drm/amd/display: Fix potential NULL pointer dereferences in 'dcn10_set_output_transfer_func()'  The 'stream' pointer is used in dcn10_set_output_transfer_func() before the check if 'stream' is NULL.  Fixes the below: drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../display/dc/hwss/dcn10/dcn10_hwseq.c:1892 dcn10_set_output_transfer_func() warn: variable dereferenced before check 'stream' (see line 1875)
